enb_long_title: United Nations Climate Change Conference - Bali
sentences: This item was referred by the COP/MOP to the SBI, which considered the issue on 5 December (FCCC/SBI/2007/25 and MISC.8).
The matter was then referred to a contact group co-chaired by Helmut Hojesky (Austria) and Crispin D'Auvergne (Saint Lucia).
The group did not make progress, with differences between the G-77/China, which sought a COP/MOP decision, and a number of Annex I parties, which preferred SBI conclusions.
With no outcome agreed, the SBI agreed in its closing plenary on 11 December to place the issue on its provisional agenda for SBI 28.
However, as a result of subsequent consultations during the high-level segment (12-14 December), an agreement was reached and draft conclusions were approved by the COP/MOP on 14 December.
